name: Mamluks
startIntroPart1: Marhaba, great al-Mustansir, of the emergent Mamluk Sultanate!
startIntroPart2: Show them who rules the desert!
attacked: May God have mercy on you, for I will not
defeated: I'll see you in the afterlife
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniqueText: Cost of purchasing [units] -33%, units gain +50% XP and purchased Archers gain the Accuracy I Promotion
uniques: [Gold] cost of purchasing units in cities [-33]%

name: Byzantium

attacked: May God have mercy on you, for I will not
defeated: I'll see you in the afterlife
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniqueText: May buy all religious buildings without needing the religious belief for it. +1 Science from all religious buildings.
